amendment.description: To establish a deficit neutral reserve fund to repeal the tax increases enacted under the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act that were imposed on low- and middle-income Americans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 222 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 54. Record Vote Number: 53.

action.text: Amendment SA 222 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Crapo. (consideration: CR S2130-2134; text: CR S2131) To establish a deficit neutral reserve fund to repeal the tax increases enacted under the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act that were imposed on low- and middle-income Americans.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 222 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 54. Record Vote Number: 53.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 222 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 54. Record Vote Number: 53.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 222 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Crapo.
